name: Virus is Everywhere
description:
Instructions:

  • You must collect the four keys to open the door that leads to the virus boss room.
  • You move with the arrow keys.
  • You shoot with the W-A-S-D keys.
  • Be careful with viruses, if they reach you, they will increase the percentage of infection in the infection bar.
  • If your bar reaches 100%, the game is over.
  • To counteract the contagion effects, you can use items with the Q-E-R keys.
  • The antibacterial gel reduces the contagion multiplier.
  • The pill reduces part of the infection bar.
  • The vaccine removes the contagion multiplier and resets the infection bar.

Authors:

  • Cruz Bravo Kevin Zahid.
  • Jiménez Gutiérrez Humberto De Jesús.
  • Perez Garcia Jasson.
